ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Local Name (if other/tax collector) field, depending on specific Tax Agency, Tax Type, Local Name and Status values for Pennsylvania
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( (LEN(Local_Name_if_other_tax_collector__c) = 0) ), (ISPICKVAL(Local_Name__c, 'EIT - Berkheimer')), (ISPICKVAL(Tax_Type__c, 'Local/Other') ), (ISPICKVAL(Tax_Agency__c, 'PA - PENNSYLVANIA')), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Additional Notice Received'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Transferring to PAC Service & Support Team'))) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Local Name (if other/tax collector) field, when selecting a Local Name value of EIT - Berkheimer.
